item.title: Sherri add a quote by Robert Heinlein
item.description: "Yield to temptation...it may not pass your way again!" -- Robert Heinlein

item.title: Sherri add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Everything in excess! To enjoy the flavor of life, take big bites. Moderation is for monks." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Sherri add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "There ain't no such thing as a free lunch." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Sherri add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "I am free, no matter what rules surround me. If I find them tolerable, I tolerate them; if I find them too obnoxious, I break them. I am free because I know that I alone am morally responsible for everything I do." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Sherri add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion, butcher a hog, conn a ship, design a building, write a sonnet, balance accounts, build a wall, set a bone, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders, cooperate, act alone, solve equations, analyze a new problem, pitch manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die gallantly. Specialization is for insects." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Sherri add a quote by Herman Wouk
item.description: "When in danger or in doubt, run in circles, scream and shout." -- Herman Wouk
